issue.title: open.spotify.com

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://open.spotify.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com) ### Comment > Aun con la extensi√≥n los comerciales o anuncios de Spotify gratuito siguen sonando cada 30 minutos o menos. comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://news4vip.livedoor.biz/archives/52542137.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews4vip.livedoor.biz%2Farchives%2F52542137.html) ### Comment > original https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/189759#issuecomment-2506531035 > > This is iframe ad frame. This is not Adshield. > > As far as the response to past issues is concerned, I think it can be added here. > https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/JapaneseFilter/sections/general_elemhide.txt#L148 > > > Copy ID/Class as text. > > I'm surprised you can't recognise the string of characters (alphabet) in the screenshot 2, but I am kind enough to provide it. > Since Alex can't handle it, I think it would be better to leave it to Yuki. > ``` > img src="//ir-jp.amazon-adsystem.com/e/ir?t=hasimotti2150-22&l=am2&o=9&a=B07QG6GP6X" > ``` ### Screenshots

issue.title: beliebige.webseite.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://beliebige.webseite.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fbeliebige.webseite.com) ### Comment > Chrome nutzen und irgendwann erscheint rechts unten in der Ecke neuerdings ein √§u√üerst nerviger Hinweis, die Regelgrenze sei erreicht, dabei wird Werbung nach wie vor erfolgreich geblockt. > Bitte unbedingt alle Filter in eine gro√üe Regel zusammenfassen, damit Chrome nicht mehr meckert. Das kann so nicht weiter gehen. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/r2ch6u542lw8wwo8cc0socs8sogkggoggxjoegua74.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.0.168 MV3 System version: | Linux x86_64 Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Quick Fixes Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | U Block origin

issue.body:
